p: The CI values for Zingiber montanum (J.Koenig) Link ex A.Dietr. and Curcuma longa L. ranked among the top five for treatments of abdominal pain, colitis, diarrhea, flatulence, constipation and peptic ulcers. Different gingers were used for different treatments. Zingiber montanum had the highest CI value for flatulence. For the treatment of peptic ulcers, the highest FL was for C. longa, while Z. montanum and Z. ottensii ranked as the top species for the treatment of abdominal pain ( Table S2).
